org.apache.jena.riot

Class RiotWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.riot.RiotWriter
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class RiotWriter
extends Object
    Direct call to create writers for specific formats. The normal way to write is RDFDataMgr

public static WriterGraphRIOT createNTriplesASCII()
        Deprecated. Use RDFDataMgr.createGraphWriter(RDFFormat) and RDFFormat.NTRIPLES_ASCII
        Create an N-Triples writer, restricted to ASCII characters in the output. Other chars escaped in \ u sequences.
